title: Virginia Tech handed first loss by Wright State - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech handed first loss by Wright State  VT hokiesports.com
description: Rushing out to the 4-0 lead during the first inning on Friday, the Virginia Tech baseball team was unable to slow the pesky bats of Wright State as the Hokies suffered their first loss of the season, 11-5, at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park.
